# Avantis Video

## Example

```html
<amp-ad width="16" height="9" layout="responsive"
    type="avantisvideo"
    data-id="883e5fba-d002-4a29-8b5d-f5a13737fd0d"
    data-tagId="1">
</amp-ad>
```

## Configuration

For additional details and support contact support@avantisvideo.com.

### Required parameters

-   `data-id`: the publisher id
-   `data-tagid`: the tag id
